name: Derek Burton
body:
My name is Derek Burton. I am a student at Northern Kentucky University, currently studying Computer Science. I will be graduating in December of 2014, and then will be pursuing a career into development, either through Software Engineering or through Web development.  

I have experimented with many programming languages, but my favorite is still the reliable (for me at least) language of Java. I have done some web development as well, using PHP and Ruby on Rails.

Thanks for checking out my web site.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
